name: The Game Show: The Game
description:
Game About:
Win rounds and rounds of Trivia Questions by working together with you team mate!
This game is made for MultiplayerGameJam 2022.

Theme:
The Theme is "Trust", you can only go far if you give "Trust" to your Team Mates, and also respect the "Trust" they give you.

Controls:
Keyboards only to move:
Player 1 - A and S
Player 2 - C and V
Player 3 - N and M
Player 4 - Left Arrow Key and Right Arrow Key

DevNote:
